name: Eurolite Color Chief 2.0
description: The Color Chief DMX controller offers an innovative control
concept combining easy handling with astounding results. It has been
developed especially for both colored spot lights and simpler light
effects. Altogether, the Color Chief can control a total of 8 spot lights
fixtureUsage: Place the downloaded *.lib fixture files into a folder
called COLORCHIEF in the root of the USB stick.
The corresponding *.txt files are a human readable form
of how the channels are mapped to the control elements.
helpWanted: Is it possible for multiple patched fixtures to have the same DMX start address in the Color Chief configuration? This is currently needed for large fixture modes that occupy more than 4 segments, e.g. Showtec Pixel Bar 12 MKII's RGB Individual mode.
